Came for the gameplay, and again for the killers

Worst Matchmaking in the history of gaming. Tedious Bloodpoint farming. Cant even make points if playing with friends in costum games. 

What devs would be dense enough to put unranked people playing their first games agaisnt multiple top rank survivors with top perks? This doesnt make any sens. You don't even have perks to begin with and you need to unlock to at least Lv15 with the killers FOR EACH KILLER to actually be able to put 4 perks AND lvl them Lv3 to be decent perks which require like 500k bloodpoints at 20k points each game!

Meanwhile you get fcked in matcmaking with poeple having the best perks and best ranks. And you HAVE to do it to have points, you cant even make some with friends! WTF is this garbage game mechanic? 

I bought the game this week, checked EVERY day at the time I was playing, its 60k+ players. Don't tell me matchmaking is dead cause no one is playing, it's just the worst I have ever seen. Even worst is that the community is as toxic as the LoL community but they are top ranked with the sweatiest and full META perks. It's like playing LoL ranked game with Diamonds and Challenger as a freaking bronze but even worst cause they have all the best Perks and Addons and you have fck all.

Fun with friend in costum tho. When Ai matchmaking so I dont have to deal with sweaty toxic top ranked players?

Steve Harrington is a fictional character from the Netflix television show Stranger Things, portrayed by Joe Keery. While starting out as a typical unlikable jock, Steve has grown into a more paternal and caring character as the show has progressed, a development that has received widespread acclaim from critics and fans alike and has led to him becoming one of the show’s most beloved and enduring characters.[1] Initially a part of the recurring cast, Keery was promoted to the main cast in the second season. Steve is a side antagonist turned protagonist at the end of season 1, and one of the main protagonists of season 2, season 3, and season 4.

The game is absolute garbage, from the gameplay to the devs. It was still good when I picked it up, but by now the whole thing sunk into a toxic pit where the dev's official response to problems are "we don't care" or "it would be too much effort so we aren't doing it". The only reason I still play it is because there is no competition  in the genre and I grew attached to the characters; it will change though when VHS comes out. You're better off waiting for that instead, trust me.

Despite all the quirks and balancing issues this game has, i still love it. I would strongly recommend it. 

There is no other game like this. When I bought this way back then I didn't really play it, it was just sitting in my library collecting dust. My partner was the one who actually got me into it. 
For pretty much 11 months straight, we haven't stopped playing it. we absolutely love the game. 
The Developers are constantly updating it and trying to keep it fresh, yes they do miss the mark quite a few times but they still care. The fact that the game is cross-platform is also another reason I like it so much. It just adds so much compatibility to it. my partner who is on switch can still play with me on PC. that's really appreciated 

If you like the horror genre then I definitely think this game is worth it. There are so many recognizable faces in the game, for example my favourite Ghostface or even Micheal Myers himself. I do think for the amount of fun you get out of it is well worth it. If you have friends to play with it then that's even better! 

If not there is the DBD Discord Community which CONSTANTLY has people in it's voice chat, we've met so many lovely people through there. 

A lot of the comments you will see complaining about the state of the game or even the toxic community. Just like every community/game, it has it's rotten eggs, if you can look past that then it will be a great experience. If you're annoyed at how a match went, just stop there, It will make un-enjoyable, this goes for every game.

W dead by daylight zacząłem grać około 3 lata temu ze znajomymi. Gra mi się podobała, ale twórcy sami nft czy nowymi aktualizacjami pełnymi błędów zabijają tę grę. Ratuje tę grę fakt, że lubię do niej co pewien czas wracać i pograć ze znajomymi. Niestety gra ma też toksyczne community i nie zbalansowane perki.
Ostatecznie polecam zagrać, jeśli ktoś jest fanem horrorów i ma z kim zagrać, bo ta gra samemu jest po prostu nudna.

屠夫需要加强！！！！！！！0杀真的很难受，然后人类还嘲讽你，屠夫玩家-1
挺好一游戏，可惜基础要求太高，导致玩家基数少，单排人类和玩屠夫体验都不是很好，对新手和独狼不友好。但是非对称游戏难以平衡老毛病了，因为魂系列玩的很多，心态挺好的，所以对我来说还是很快乐的。屠夫确实难玩了很多，但是这也让每一局四杀变珍贵了，短短10多分钟可以获得的成就感。

Я ИГРАЮ В ДБД ПО ЭТИМ ПРИЧИНАМ: КОРОБКА, ПОЛУКОРОБКА, ЕДИНИЧКА, ДЛИНКА, ТЭШКА. КИДАЙ СРАЗУ ЕБЛАН. АНСЕЙФ ГОВНО ПРОТИВ АНИ, ПОЛУЧАЮ В ЕБЛО ПРОТИВ МОРА, ЛОВЛЮ ПЕРОЧИНКИ ОТ БТС-НИКА.

Oyun aşırı derecede güzel ve bazı oyun, dizi ve filmler'in karakterleri bu oyunda'da var ve sırf o karakterlerle o oyunun, dizinin ve filmin haritalarında oynamakta ayrı bir zevkli oluyor. Oyun ilk başlarda baya gerici oluyor fakat sonradan ortama alışıyorsunuz, ilk başta size korku oyunu gibi gelebilir fakat değil, ama gerilim kategorisine girebilir. Oyun basit, 4 kurban ve 1 katil var, kurbanlar haritada bulunan 5 jeneratörü yapıp çıkış kapılarına güç veriyorlar ve mekandan kaçmaya çalışıyorlar katil ise onları öldürüp kaçmalarına engel olmaya çalışıyor ve oyunda sona kalan tek kişiyseniz eğer, size alternatif bir kaçış yolu olarak bir kapak açılıyor ve atlayıp kaçabiliyorsunuz fakat katilde bu kapağı kapatabilir. İndirimde iken alınabilir fakat önceden oyunun indirimsiz fiyatı 40TL iken şimdi indirimli fiyatı 40TL olmuş, şahsen önceden indirimde 30TL'ye oyunu alanlar çok şanslı. Oyunda geçirdiğim saatlerden hiç pişman değilim ve dahada fazla vakit geçirebileceğim oyunlardan. Onun dışında, oynanış, grafikler, fizikler ve mekanik'ler aşırı güzel ve aşırı saran bir çevrim içi pvp oyunu. Oyunu alırsanız ve hoşunuza giderse rahat 100 saat oynarsınız, Önceden yaptığım inceleme aşırı detaylıydı ve oyunda ne var ne yok anlatıyordum, fakat incelemeyi kısa kesip ayrı bir şekilde rehber olarak paylaşacağım, tam olarak yapacağım rehberi ne zaman yüklerim bilmiyorum ama incelememi gördüğünüz zaman profilimden rehberlere bakabilirsiniz. Söyleyeceklerim bu kadardı, oyunu oynayacak pek arkadaşım yok oynamak isterseniz ekleyebilirsiniz <3

geçen oyunda yaşadığım anımı anlatayım. Oyunuma a*** diye bir Türk geldi. Öyle olunca selam yazdım cevap vermedi oyuna girdik. Oyunda a*** beni hooktan aldığında iyileştirirken daha safe hook olmadan katil geldi. Beni bırakıp gitti. Katil de bana geldi doğal olarak.  Kovalanırken DS de bitti. 2. hooka geçtim. Oyun sonunda sadece Arda öldü, biz kaçtık. Konuşma yerine '2 DS vardı biri kaçırdı ama iyi oyundu' yazdı ingilizce. Başka konuşan yoktu. Bu da böyle garip bir anım.
